Function Documentation

public status mat_alloc (  matrix *    pmat,
int    rows,
int    cols
) 
 

Allocate a new, uninitialized 2-D matrix.

Allocates memory space for a bidimensional matrix of 1..rows x 1..cols elements

Parameters:
pmat  address of the matrix to allocate
rows  the number of rows in the 2D-matrix
cols  the number of columns in the 2D-matrix
Returns:
success if all went well, an error code otherwise
Note:
if MAT_PARANOIA has been defined, parameter checking is performed

Referenced by mat_invert().

public void mat_free (  matrix    mat ) 
 

free a 2D-matrix

Parameters:
mat  the matrix to be freed, must have been allocated by mat_alloc()
Returns:
SUCCESS if all went well
